MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 19-JAN-2021 14:57.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the L39 postcode area of Aughton, affecting properties in Liverpool Road, Rothwell Drive, Standhouse Lane and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:56 am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 3:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:06 pm on 19th January, 2021.
